ISSUE.TITLE: Edit secrets
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Currently to edit a secret you must: - trigger a build with a hack to dump the current secret variable - delete the secret in drone - re-create the secret Is it possible to make it easier ? My use case is: I have a secret per deployement ie. STAGING_ENV that contains a multiline list of env vars. Then in my .drone.yml I do `export $(echo $STAGING_ENV| xargs)`. Keep up the gr8 work :heart:
